snippet: The United States will play host to Italy in February in the first round of the Federation Cup. Italy beat the United States in the 2009 and 2010 finals and in the first round this year.
lead_paragraph: The United States will play host to Italy in February in the first round of the Federation Cup. Italy beat the United States in the 2009 and 2010 finals and in the first round this year.

headline.main: U.S. to Host Italy in Fed Cup
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Host Italy in Fed Cup
